author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Right now, the award will not display the actual amount of recruits a person made, but will round down to the previous power of 10. So if someone recruits say 500 people, it will only show 100 on their page. That might be a bug in need of being fixed.
body_html: Right now, the award will not display the actual amount of recruits a person made, but will round down to the previous power of 10. So if someone recruits say 500 people, it will only show 100 on their page. That might be a bug in need of being fixed.

title: Suggestion: on the recruiting badge, show the actual number of recruits the person made, not the minimum amount to get the award (1, 10, 100, 1000, etc.)

author.bio:
Status: writing ruqqus documentation

"I want married trans couples to be able to defend their cocaine farms with full-auto rifles."
